description.value:
Master-Crafted Relic Servo-Skull of the Deathwatch. Uses Regular Servo Skull template but with WS 30, T 30, and +20 Awareness, Concealment, and Silent Move. Is equipped with an Auspex and Astartes Signum.

Requirements

Servo Skull built from a Space Marine. Weight only applies if being carried.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 35 R
